General.Name: Haiwan International Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd engages in the hotel business. The company operates in two segments, Real Estate Investment and Construction, and Catering Services. It engages in land development, housing construction, and rental and sale business; and hotel housing services and catering businesses. The company was formerly known as Haewan International Development Co., Ltd and changed its name to Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd. in 2014. Haiwan International Development Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
